title: A deadeye theory

embed.description: This is my theory for the "deadeye" teasers that have been going up recently on different league of legends champion pages. So far only the zed and sona teasers have come up and after watching the sona teaser something ticked in me. Why was there a wound where sona's throat is?

body:
This is my second  deadeye related post and in this theory I believe deadeye didn't kill zed and sona but healed them.

I based this theory off how sakura's is often represented as rebirth in Japanese culture (at least I think it is) and there was one in zed's teaser. In the previous post I said how zed may have lost an eye against Shen and this deadeye may have healed him, same with sona who is mute. I don't have a lot of faith in this theory because it doesn't explain why he/she is called deadeye, it might be a riot tactic to throw us off the sent but I highly doubt that. If the code didn't have deadeye in them and maybe had any other name I might've believed this theory more. It is completely plausible in every way other then the name. Deadeye might be some kind of ranged far off healer but I highly doubt it since its first off too op and the name dosnt match. You can go check out my other theory which is a lot more plausible and more likely to be true.
